languages.text: {n}Несмотря на показательную расслабленность, большинство ксеносов держится на пределе своих сил. Они истощены, нервозны, напуганы, пусть и хорошо скрывают это. От ваших спутников — не от вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Несмотря на показательную расслабленность, большинство ксеносов держится на пределе своих сил. Они истощены, нервозны, напуганы, пусть и хорошо скрывают это. От ваших спутников — не от вас.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Despite their affected ease, most of the xenos are pushing themselves to their limit. They are exhausted, nervous, and frightened, even if they hide it well. This may have eluded your companions, but not you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Несмотря на показательную расслабленность, большинство ксеносов держится на пределе своих сил. Они истощены, нервозны, напуганы, пусть и хорошо скрывают это. От ваших спутников — не от вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Despite the demonstrative ease, most xenos are pushing themselves to their limit. They are exhausted, nervous, and frightened despite trying to hide this. This may have eluded your companions, but not you.{/n}

{n}Despite the demonstrative ease, most xenos are pushing themselves to their limit. They are exhausted, nervous, and frightened despite trying to hide this. This may have eluded your companions, but not you.{/n}

{n}Despite the demonstrative ease, most xenos are pushing themselves to their limit. They are exhausted, nervous, and frightened, even if they hide it well. This may have eluded your companions, but not you.{/n}

{n}Despite the demonstrative ease, most xenos are pushing themselves to their limit. They are exhausted, nervous, and frightened, even if they hide it well. This may have eluded your companions, but not you.{/n}

{n}Despite their affected ease, most of the xenos are pushing themselves to their limit. They are exhausted, nervous, and frightened, even if they hide it well. This may have eluded your companions, but not you.{/n}

{n}Despite their affected ease, most of the xenos are pushing themselves to their limit. They are exhausted, nervous, and frightened, even if they hide it well. This may have eluded your companions, but not you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A pesar de su intento de aparentar relajación, notas que la mayoría de los xenos se hallan al límite de sus fuerzas. Están agotados, nerviosos y asustados, aunque lo disimulan muy bien. Puede que tus compañeros lo hayan pasado por alto, pero tú no.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite their affected ease, most of the xenos are pushing themselves to their limit. They are exhausted, nervous, and frightened, even if they hide it well. This may have eluded your companions, but not you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A pesar de su aspecto relajado, notas que la mayoría de los xenos se hallan al límite de sus fuerzas. Están agotados, nerviosos y asustados, aunque lo disimulan muy bien. Puede que tus compañeros lo hayan pasado por alto, pero tú no.{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管绝大部分异形看起来很放松，但他们实际上已经濒临极限了，非常疲惫、紧张、害怕。他们掩饰得很好，或许能瞒过你同伴们的眼睛，但瞒不过你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite their affected ease, most of the xenos are pushing themselves to their limit. They are exhausted, nervous, and frightened, even if they hide it well. This may have eluded your companions, but not you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管绝大部分异形表现得自然、放松，但他们实际上已经濒临极限了，非常疲惫、紧张、害怕。他们掩饰得很好，或许能瞒过你同伴们的眼睛，但瞒不过你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Même s'ils le cachent bien derrière leur apparente aisance, la plupart des xénos sont épuisés, nerveux et effrayés. Cela a peut-être échappé à vos compagnons, mais vous voyez clairement qu'ils sont presque à bout de force.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite their affected ease, most of the xenos are pushing themselves to their limit. They are exhausted, nervous, and frightened, even if they hide it well. This may have eluded your companions, but not you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Même s'ils le cachent bien derrière leur apparente aisance, la plupart des xénos sont épuisés, nerveux et effrayés. Cela a peut-être échappé à vos compagnons, mais vous clairement qu'ils sont presque à bout de force.{/n}

languages.text: {n}余裕を装ってはいるものの、ほとんどの異種族は限界に近い。疲弊し、神経質になり、怯えている。隠そうとはしていても、それは明らかだ。このことは、あなたの仲間にはわからないかもしれないが、あなたにはハッキリと見えている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite their affected ease, most of the xenos are pushing themselves to their limit. They are exhausted, nervous, and frightened, even if they hide it well. This may have eluded your companions, but not you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}余裕を装ってはいるものの、ほとんどの異種族は限界に近い。疲弊し、神経質になり、怯えている。隠そうとはしていても、それは明らかだ。このことは、あなたの仲間にはわからないかもしれないが、あなたにはハッキリと見えている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Trotz der vorgespielten Leichtigkeit gehen die meisten Xenos bis an ihre Grenzen. Sie sind erschöpft, nervös und verängstigt, auch wenn sie es gut verstecken. Deinen Gefährten mag das entgangen sein, dir jedoch nicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite their affected ease, most of the xenos are pushing themselves to their limit. They are exhausted, nervous, and frightened, even if they hide it well. This may have eluded your companions, but not you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Trotz der demonstrativen Mühelosigkeit gehen die meisten Xenos bis an ihre Grenzen. Sie sind erschöpft, nervös und verängstigt, auch wenn sie es gut verstecken. Deinen Gefährten mag das entgangen sein, dir jedoch nicht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yapmacık rahatlıklarına rağmen çoğu zeno, kendi sınırlarını zorluyor. Çok iyi gizleseler de aslında bitkin düşmüşler, gerginler ve korkuyorlar. Bu hakikat, yoldaşlarının gözlerinden kaçsa da senden kaçmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite their affected ease, most of the xenos are pushing themselves to their limit. They are exhausted, nervous, and frightened, even if they hide it well. This may have eluded your companions, but not you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yapmacık rahatlıklarına rağmen çoğu zeno, kendi sınırlarını zorluyor. Çok iyi gizleseler de aslında bitkin düşmüşler, gerginler ve korkuyorlar. Bu hakikat, yoldaşlarının gözlerinden kaçsa da senden kaçmıyor.{/n}
